    • Method Detail

      • onAttackKeyPressed

        void onAttackKeyPressed​(javafx.scene.input.KeyEvent keyEvent)
        Key Event starts when an key is pressed, here E for first character and NUMPAD0 for the second one. If an fireball has been thrown before, destruct this instance and instantiates another one
        Parameters:
        keyEvent - Event of onKeyPressed
